name: Xtrem Horse Adventure 2017
description:
Extreme horse racing 2017 has some slick game play and realistic 3D graphics that give it users a new experience and it is an absolute rival for upcoming horse racing games.

We provide you amazing jungle moments with this simulator game. You are supposed to ride horse and to collect all the gems/diamonds come during way as the journey is not so easy it has some obstacles which will test your ride means it is challenging and exciting at the same time. Remember to collect the coins as much as possible.

Challenging environment with super amazing models ahead the smooth journey of this horse is endless as one thing require to collect more diamonds as this will help to get unlimited energy. Controls of this game are easy to use swipe and tilt both options can be used by the user. Simply tap to play and start this endless ride through this extreme racing horse of 2017.

Download this super exciting game because it engages you better way and obviously fun is guaranteed! So are u ready to take up the challenge!

How to play:
• Select control as per your convenience
• Swipe and tilt controls
• Overcome hurdles by jumping
• Collect as much collectables or gems as you could for high score
• Ride endlessly

Features:
• Swipe control
• Tilt control
• Amazing 3D graphics
• Easy to control
• Ultra realistic 3D effect
• Endless running and simulation
